pages.title: Marginated Tortoise
pages.text: The marginated tortoise ($(o)Testudo marginata$()) is a species of tortoise in the family Testudinidae.$(br2)The species is endemic to Greece, Italy, and the Balkans in Southern Europe.$(br2)It is the largest European tortoise.$(br2)The marginated tortoise is herbivorous, and brumates for the winter.

pages.title: Marginated Tortoise
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
